column5: The information contained herein is a listing of Diagnosis Related Groups (DRGs).

column2: INTRACRANIAL HEMORRHAGE OR CEREBRAL INFARCTION W CC OR TPA I
column5: This information is required by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) requirement [FY 2019 IPPS/LTCH PPS Final Rule; CMS-1694-F] from most hospitals operating within the United States.
Hospitals must list and update a list of their standard charges for each DRG under section 1886(d)(4) of the Social Security Act.

column2: CHRONIC OBSTRUCTIVE PULMONARY DISEASE W MCC
column5: The list contains calendar year 2018 inpatient discharges grouped using the current year CMS MS-DRG.

column2: CHRONIC OBSTRUCTIVE PULMONARY DISEASE W CC
column5: The current Medicare year's geographic mean length of stay (LOS) and description is used.

column2: CHRONIC OBSTRUCTIVE PULMONARY DISEASE W/O CC/MCC
column5: The current year is used if the same MS-DRG is present in two Medicare periods.
Charges are averaged by DRG by taking the total charges divided by the total case volume per DRG.
Averages are listed for acute inpatients and newborn accounts.
The charges to patients with all insurances were included in calculating the average charges per DRG.

column2: HEART FAILURE & SHOCK W MCC OR PERIPHERAL EXTRACORPOREAL MEM
column5: Charges to Rehabilitation and Long Term Care accounts have been excluded.
Also excluded are charges related to error MS-DRGs 0, 998, 999.
Individual cases where LOS is greater than the Geographic Mean LOS times 1.5 are excluded.
Low volume DRGs where number of cases are < 10 are excluded.

column2: CARDIAC ARRHYTHMIA & CONDUCTION DISORDERS W CC

HIP & FEMUR PROCEDURES EXCEPT MAJOR JOINT W CC

KIDNEY & URINARY TRACT INFECTIONS W/O MCC
UTERINE & ADNEXA PROC FOR NON-MALIGNANCY W/O CC/MCC
